tweet.text: What was the focus of the last 18 months of the first term of the Reagan administration? In #FRUS, find President Reagan’s June 1983 charge to Secretaries Shultz and Weinberger to set these goals and priorities: https://t.co/QRDt54KUru https://t.co/VDPd3CoC1G
